title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 2.7 - Requests for records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 2.7 - Requests for records

State Regulations
(a) Requests
for access to, correction or amendments of records shall be made in writing. All requests shall be filed with or referred to the appropriate personal
privacy compliance officer. (b) No
special form is required for such requests. A request should reasonably
describe the record sought. When possible, the requestor should supply
identifying information to assist the department in locating the records
sought. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง
2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
